short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert the screenshots into pdfs by a click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot to PDF is a powerful tool that allows you to effortlessly gather your screenshots in one place and convert them into a professionally formatted PDF, simplifying the organization and sharing of them.

Features:
- Take screenshots by a single click of the button.
- Works directly on the website youâ€™re viewing, capturing exactly what you see.
- Change the order of the captured screenshots by dragging and dropping them.
- Easily convert the captured screenshots in a nice and formatted pdf file.
